ModMetaData.name: Kenney's Addons - Reduced Meal Costs
ModMetaData.author: kenney84
ModMetaData.description:
UPDATED FOR 1.3 (COMPATIBLE WITH 1.1 AND 1.2) THIS MOD WILL BE INCOMPATIBLE WITH ANY MOD THAT ALTERS WHAT THIS MOD CHANGES.
Meals and food will cost less. This is an addon to the core Kenney's Fixes Mod (Though the original isn't required.) Link to the core mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1452835233
*** See the workshop page for a more in-depth list of meal cost changes! ***
